Headline: Delays on Loop 'L' (elevated lines)
ShortDescription: Green, Orange, & Pink Line trains are experiencing delays due to loss of power near Adams/Wabash.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green, Orange, & Pink Line trains are experiencing delays due to loss of power near Adams/Wabash.

On the Orange Line, shuttle buses have been requested between Halsted and Library to provide connecting service.

On the Green Line shuttle buses have been requested between 35th-Bronzeville and Adams/Wabash to provide connecting service. At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Crews are working to correct the problem.

Allow extra travel time.
